Html:
winxp sp3
all previous versions uninstalled
trying to install default server sql server 2008 express but after marking default server and next I can se (on back button) that named instance sqlexpress is instaling
is it impossible to install default instance?
any help  ???

This is a great question for our SQL forums on MSDN: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/sqlserver/bb671079.aspx

It's also been reported as community feedback @ https://connect.microsoft.com/SQLServer/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=361809&wa=wsignin1.0, if you want to vote on the reported issue.

FYI, Express edition is not intended to run as a "default" instance, and it's my opinion that it shouldn't be.

tks for reply

ok, but

on page:
http://www.codeplex.com/SqlServerSamples/Wiki/View.aspx?title=SQLServerDatabasesandSamplesOverview&referringTitle=Home

---is note:
Note: For Microsoft Windows 2003 and Microsoft Windows XP operating systems
you must have a default instance of the server installed in order to
successfully install sample databases to a named instance for SQL Server 2008.

so does it mean I can not nstall SQL2008.AdventureWorks_OLTP_DB_v2008.x86.msi
on win xp sp3 pc with ms sql server 2008 express

anything I try instaling it - definitely freezees my pc
